errors.VALIDATION_ERROR: The given token couldn't be verified. Please request a new one and try again.
errors.VERIFY_USER_TOKEN_EXPIRED: This token has already expired. Please request a new one and try again.
errors.VERIFY_USER_BAD_TOKEN: This token is invalid. Please request a new one and try again.
errors.VERIFY_USER_ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email has already been verified.
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: We're not sure what went wrong. Please request a new token and try to verify your account again. If that doesn't work, contact someone in charge.
errors.MISSING_TOKEN: Your verification token is missing. Please request a new one and try again.
